Reviews.Content: rome 4 days 3 nights booked hotel welcome received arranged private car return airport price taxi fantastic bathroom location fantastic 5 mins walk spanish steps corner via veneto lots little cafes nice shops easy reach didnt eat breakfast day normally 7am ahead crowds plenty close walking towards sight seeing day massimo marco helpful questions hotel vibe relaxed hip wouldnt parents stay designer hotels spot stay
